# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $12000 to us. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I propose a special introductory price of $10800 for you. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your interest and commitment. Don't miss out on this fantastic deal! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,800. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,800
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
